section.name: Related links
section.p: Here are some links that might be of interest if you are browsing this page.

tr.td: A powerful finance manager under GNU/Linux, developed under GPL.
CBB is a free, open-source application written in TCL/Tk and Perl.
Xinvest is a free personal finance tracking and performance tool for the X Window System.
Moneydance is a another finance manager written in Java. However, it is not open-source but a free trial version is available.
Eurobudget is written in Java under GPL.
Contains various links to other projects.
This website was generated with Maven. This is a great tool and we love it!
Kunststoff is the preferred look & feel for JMoney. Have a look at the screenshots.
